css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("cracked.com") {

/**
 * User style for Cracked.com to give the site a clean look.
 * v2.0
 *
 * Changelog
 * =========
 * 1.1:
 * - Hide the Share buttons
 * 
 * 1.2:
 * - Slightly increased the size of the Popular/Greatest Hits
 *   tabbed list (.col3_2) on the mainpage's left hand site.
 * 
 * 2.0:
 * - Complete redo for new Cracked layout
 *
 * 2.1:
 * - Some changes for the June 2011 layout tweak
 * 
 **/

#absAdUnit,
#Ad300,
.Ad300x250,
.adUnit,
#cracked_partners,
#dailyGist,
#fb-fanbox,
#fb_sliver,
#follow_me,
#Footer,
#fb-friends-recent-activity,
#header-nav-featured-url,
#iphoneBlip,
#NewsletterAndSearch,
#persistent-share,
#pshare-container,
#Series,
.shareBar { display: none !important; }

}
